attributes.action: stop the planned islamic march on wootton bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i feel very strongly about this subject.
as our great country's PM myself and no doubt,1000's of others feel that you should step in and stop the planned islamic march on wootton bassett.  these extremists should not have the right to fuel hatred in a quite village that respects the dead soldiers that fought for you,us and our country.
pleads from the village and its residents will fall on death ears.
please do not let this happen !!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
